sentences.en: Few Englishmen wear frock coats now. They went out years ago.
sentences.cn: 现在,英国人很少穿大礼服了, 大礼服在多年以前就不时兴了.

sentences.en: He had insisted on dressing himself up in a frock - coat and the most dismal pepper - and - salt trousers.
sentences.cn: 他固执己见地穿着礼服大衣和那条最悔气的黑白 相间 的裤子.

sentences.en: He was on the stage with a short muslin frock.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件细洋纱的长衫来到了台上.

sentences.en: How pretty she is; and how that best frock do set her off!
sentences.cn: 她怎么长的那么好看!配上那件连衣裙,更好看了!

sentences.en: Miss Lin had heard that this charming frock was made of Japanese material.
sentences.cn: 据说这怪好看的假毛葛和驼绒都是东洋来的.

sentences.en: Not that it isn't a very sweet frock, darling, but -- well, it does look a bit worn.
sentences.cn: 并不是说这一件不好看, 亲爱的, 可是 ---- 嗯, 它显得有点旧了.

sentences.en: Oh, you have a pretty frock?
sentences.cn: 啊, 你有件漂亮的长袍?

sentences.en: She stood up and smoothed down her frock.
She was dressed in her everyday print frock which suited her coloring much better.
sentences.cn: 她穿的是时常穿的那种花紧身衣,这种衣服同她的肤色配合起来显得更为协调.

sentences.en: She was in a dowdy blue frock.
sentences.cn: 她穿了件不大洁净的蓝上衣.

sentences.en: She wore a white frock with pink bow on the breast and arms.
sentences.cn: 她穿着胸前和袖上嵌有粉红色蝴蝶结的雪白长衫.
那件上衣太短,让你的衬裙露出来了.

sentences.en: The frock - coats have gone out.
The frock is now out of style.
sentences.cn: 这种女上衣已不时新了.

sentences.en: Why have you that silk frock on?
sentences.cn: 你为什么要穿那件绸衣服?

trans.tran_cn: 女装，连衣裙，僧袍，教士服，长工作服
